title: Trousers

properties.name: description
properties.value: Trousers are sold in Keldagrim at Vermundi's Clothes Stall (brown) and Agmundi Quality Clothes (blue and yellow). The blue and brown versions can also be bought at the Miscellanian Clothes Shop in Miscellania, although this requires partial completion of Royal Trouble. They are purely for decoration.

content:
This article is about trousers sold in Keldagrim. For other uses, see Trousers (disambiguation).

Trousers are sold in Keldagrim at Vermundi's Clothes Stall (brown) and Agmundi Quality Clothes (blue and yellow). The blue and brown versions can also be bought at the Miscellanian Clothes Shop in Miscellania, although this requires partial completion of Royal Trouble. They are purely for decoration.

The clothes are specifically made for dwarves but Agmundi does sell the clothes to the few humans who come past her shop in Keldagrim. The skirts are made by Agmundi's sister, Vermundi.

Item GE Price
Trousers (brown) 954
Trousers (lilac) 926
Trousers (blue) 720
